name: 10 Seconds Math
description:
How much can you do in 10 Seconds This will answer a challenging question of how much can you do in 10 seconds

Control:

Mouse click to start game
Numpad or Keyboard to type in number

Ludum Dare 51 Entry by A_Krit's_All_You_Need

 

Although I don't have much time to make this game due to my life as a salary man but all I want is to participate in Ludum Dare!
